channel.title: Isla Fisher on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Isla Fisher on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Toronto: Tiffany Haddish, Isla Fisher to Star in Action-Comedy ‘Double Crossed’ (Exclusive)
item.description: The ‘Girl’s Trip’ and ‘Wedding Crashers’ stars play two polar opposites who discover they were married to the same man in the new project, which A Higher Standard is pitching to buyers at TIFF.
